body_html:
I have a similar problem:

I want to create a random tensor of the same shape as the input my network. The input however has variable length, and is supplied by a queue. If I use the placeholder to pass the shape values, I have to evaluate the current input batch. The problem is that when I generate the input batch using sess.run then the queue will advance one step, and therefore the actual input to the network will be next batch, with a different size.

Any idea how to solve this?

body:
I have a similar problem:

I want to create a random tensor of the same shape as the input my network. The input however has variable length, and is supplied by a queue. If I use the placeholder to pass the shape values, I have to evaluate the current input batch. The problem is that when I generate the input batch using sess.run then the queue will advance one step, and therefore the actual input to the network will be next batch, with a different size. 

Any idea how to solve this?
